message: Let's start with a simple split. I propose 6000 for me and 4000 for you.  It's a fair starting point.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor. Let's be more equitable. I propose a 55/45 split.
Your proposal was tempting, Bob, but ultimately unfair. Let's stop wasting time with unequal offers. I propose a 50/50 split - the fairest and most efficient way to end this.
